premise: Two young children playing outside.
hypothesis: Two kids played.
explanation_1: the kids are outside

premise: A man wearing black pants and a white shirt stands in front of a building with signs written in some kind of Asian characters.
hypothesis: a man stands in front of a building
explanation_1: A man stands in front of a building which is identified with signs written in Asian characters.

premise: Young woman in a costume appears to be participating in a parade or dance.
hypothesis: There is a woman.
explanation_1: Young woman is a woman.

premise: A group of dogs run through the snowy field.
hypothesis: Dogs run through the field.
explanation_1: There are a group of dogs, indicating that there is more than one dog that's running through a field.

premise: A crowd sits along side a building as a man talks to them and another group of men hang out nearby on a sidewalk.
hypothesis: Crowd sits along a building side
explanation_1: The crowd sits alongside a building and a man talks to them in the first statement while in the second the crowd sits along a building side

premise: A man in swimming shorts is jumping off a cliff into a body of water.
hypothesis: A man is jumping off a cliff.
explanation_1: "A man is jumping off a cliff" is a less detailed way of describing the man in swimming shorts jumping into a body of water

premise: Two woman smile at the camera while enjoying their lunch together.
hypothesis: A couple of women smile at the camera.
explanation_1: A couple, in this context, means two, so a couple of women smile at the camera is another way of saying two women smile at the camera.

premise: A mustachioed man operates a piece of heavy construction equipment from the cab.
hypothesis: A man is operating equipment.
explanation_1: The second sentence does not describe the equipment but states equipment

premise: A man squatting in front a pile of objects.
hypothesis: A man is outside.
explanation_1: The man can be squatting inside and not outside.

premise: Female wearing a pink helmet, white shirt and white gym shorts, parking her motorcycle along side a busy sidewalk cafe.
hypothesis: A woman meeting up with a friend at a cafe.
explanation_1: Parking a motorcycle does not imply meeting up with a friend.

premise: A young child raises her arms while jumping on a yellow blow-up toy.
hypothesis: A child jumps on a beach ball.
explanation_1: Not all blow-up toy is a beach ball.

premise: Two brown dogs are wearing muzzles and running very fast through the grass.
hypothesis: Two brown dogs are playing with each other.
explanation_1: The dogs wearing muzzles are not necessarily running because they are playing with each other.

premise: 2 men stand in line at a restaurant.
hypothesis: Two friends stand in line together at a restaurant.
explanation_1: Just that two men are standing in a line together at a restaurant doesn't imply they are friends.

premise: Adults are sitting in chairs in a native hut watching children perform.
hypothesis: The adults are all watching the young children perform their first ritual dance
explanation_1: Children could be performing anything besides their first ritual dance.

premise: A man in a white shirt crossing the street in a city holding a guitar.
hypothesis: A man heading to a performance.
explanation_1: There is nothing to indicate that the man is heading to a performance.

premise: A man is diving into water on a slightly cloudy day.
hypothesis: The man is diving into a lake.
explanation_1: A body of water can be other things than a lake.

premise: A man sits in a white plastic chair outside a small building.
hypothesis: A man standing outside a restaurant.
explanation_1: one either sits or is standing, not both

premise: A little boy playing in a water spout.
hypothesis: the little girl plays with her guitar inside
explanation_1: sentence two can not be about a little girl if sentence one is about a little boy

premise: A woman is covering the eyes of another woman and both women are laughing.
hypothesis: Two women cross their arms and argue at eachother.
explanation_1: Two women can't argue while they are both laughing.

premise: Two men each holding their dog on leashes as the two dogs play with each other.
hypothesis: Two dogs are running through a field while one man runs after them.
explanation_1: The men can't be holding their dog on leashes and letting them run through a field at the same time.

premise: A person in winter gear is riding a bike near an intersection.
hypothesis: The person is in a boat wearing a bikini.
explanation_1: A person can either be in a boat or be riding a bike.

premise: A group of boys playing outside with each other while another watches.
hypothesis: A group of boys playing video games indoors.
explanation_1: They cannot be playing outside and playing video games indoors at the same time.

premise: Rear view of dark-skinned woman walking on sidewalk near artwork that is on display.
hypothesis: A woman dances on the stage.
explanation_1: The woman cannot walk on the side walk and dance on the stage simultaneously.

premise: A man in a black shirt and jeans is walking by the sea.
hypothesis: the man is jumping
explanation_1: Walking and jumping are different activities.
